name: om-data-mapper
description: High-performance TypeScript/JavaScript data mapper with JIT compilation for ultra-fast object transformations

scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run build:cjs && npm run build:esm
scripts.build:esm: tsc -p tsconfig.esm.json && node scripts/fix-esm-imports.js && echo '{"type":"module"}' > build/esm/package.json
scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run clean && npm run test && npm run build
scripts.test:esm: npm run test:esm:integration && npm run test:esm:simple && npm run test:esm:simulation
scripts.test:all: npm run test && npm run test:esm
scripts.bench:compat: npm run build && npm run bench:compat:build && node benchmarks/suites/compat/comparison.js
scripts.bench:compat:json: npm run build && npm run bench:compat:build && node benchmarks/suites/compat/comparison-json.js
scripts.bench:validation:build: cd benchmarks/suites/compat && tsc -p tsconfig.cv.json && tsc -p tsconfig.om-validation.json
scripts.bench:validation: npm run build && npm run bench:validation:build && node benchmarks/suites/compat/validation-comparison.js
scripts.bench:validation:json: npm run build && npm run bench:validation:build && node benchmarks/suites/compat/validation-comparison-json.js

author: Isqanderm <aleksandr.melnik.personal@gmail.com> (https://www.linkedin.com/in/isqander-melnik)
